text: @RealJamesWoods @NYGovCuomo there was no excuse for you to send Covid19 elderly patients back to the nursing homes. There were Covid19 beds available on the Navy ship Comfort and beds available that the Army Engineers built for Covid19 patients! Why????? This is a travesty and you need to resign https://t.co/vvsSqSPnhK
